label: Feeder portion
description: Allows for the portion control of a feeder device.

feedPortion.label: feed portion
feedPortion.description: A number that represents the portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) that will dispense.

setPortion.description: Set the portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) that the feeder will dispense.

portion.description: The portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) to dispense.
